nodes.text: A male warrior served Jedi Lord Valenthyne Farfalla during the last decade of the New Sith Wars.

A humanoid, the warrior served Jedi Master Valenthyne Farfalla, a Jedi Lord who maintained a feudal kingdom on the Outer Rim Territories. During the Jedi Order's war with the Dark Lord of the Sith Skere Kaan's Brotherhood of Darkness, he answered the call of his Lord to join together with a band of three hundred warriors, made up of Jedi Knights and commoners, to reinforce the entrenched forces of the Army of Light on the planet Ruusan. Armed with a sword, the soldier fought in the final battle of the campaign.
